nodes.text: The Razor  was a location in the Breaktown on Zakuul. During the Eternal Empire conquest it became a headquarters of the information broker known as The Lady of Sorrows. In 3631 BBY the Lady kidnapped Brennen, the son of the Heralds of Zildrog leader the Exalted and demanded him to come to the Razor. The Exalted brought many of his fellow Heralds with him, but all of them were killed except Brennen, who was ordered to lead the Heralds in the Lady's name.
The Razor appears as an area on Zakuul during Chapter 7: The Lady of Sorrows of the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion.
